column4: *pretty lame this is .. but can i store files in my 'root file system' partition or i need to create a fat partition for that ?*
slart: i c..currently im installing ubuntu and allocated 10 gb for '/' (root partition) .. i have more 1GB memory..do i need to create swap ?
it is worth it to let it create the swap
its hard drive space that your computer uses as an overflow when it needs extra ram
